issue.title: Check for broken links on generated sites
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18082](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18082). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Some of the generated sites have broken links. Many static site generation tools can check for these when building the site.  This should be enabled for the R package, and possibly for the entire documentation website. Some related pull requests:
https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14443
https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14437

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18082?focusedCommentId=17619998) by Benson Muite (baksmj):*
Maybe:
https://github.com/r-lib/urlchecker/
https://github.com/fastai/fastlinkcheck
https://github.com/gjtorikian/html-proofer
could be used
